> **"Please provide a detailed report. To help us investigate, we need:**
> 1. **A clear description of what happened.**
> 2. **Steps to reproduce the issue.**
> 3. **Copy-pasted error logs (text is preferred over images).**
> 4. **Screenshots of the error if applicable."**
